short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to stream your desktop into meetings with Bol Conference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is to support desktop sharing option for BOL conference which is based on jitsi. For chrome users to use desktop sharing in BOL conference this extension helps the users to share their desktop with others.
